channel.title: Michigan on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Michigan on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Lake Michigan Broiled Whitefish
item.description: Let’s have broiled whitefish from Lake Michigan. Simply place on foil pie pan, butter, season, and broil. Serve with drawn butter or tartar sauce. Serve with any side dish, salad, rice, or potato. Broiled Whitefish Ingredients 1 disposable. pie tin 9″-10″ 2 fresh whitefish (preferred from Lake Michigan) 2oz. butter melted couple shakes of Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1/2 lemon 2 oz. water Broiled Whitefish Directions Place whitefish in pan, then add water (do not spray pan as skin will come off when cooked).
